features.classFeatures:
Fighting Style - Two-Weapon Fighting
When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

Blade Flourish
After taking the attack actions, walking speed increases by 10 feet. If the attack hits, you may use one of the following blade flourishes. You may use only one blade flourish option per turn.
Defensive Flourish
Add your bardic inspiration die to the damage. You also add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn.
Slashing Flourish
Extra damage to the target and each other creature of your choice within 5 feet equal to your bardic inspiration die.
Mobile Flourish
Extra damage equal to bardic inspiration die. Also move them up to 5 feet away + a number of feet equal to the BID roll. You can then immediately use your reaction to move up to your walking speed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target.

Sneak Attack: 1d6
